channel.title: Social Media on
channel.description: Recent content in Social Media on

item.title: Mastodon
item.description:
Removed some plugins from my blog. Added options for foreign languages.
Added the Mastodon icon and removed the YouTube icon.
Tried out Mastodon, a decentralized social networking software. I think it is a good alternative to Twitter.

item.title: Connection
item.description:
Hold my hand
I’m real powerless to fight
Can you lead me to the light?
My strenght has come to fear
Fled in truth of dawn
Curious as a day
My heart huh woah oh

Can you bring me back to life?
Ignite the fire again?
Can you bring me back home where I am not alone?
I’m lost inside, the night and I cannot find you
Bring me back
